The company raised its guidance and announced a dividend hike, reflecting confidence in ongoing growth. TSMC's significant capital expenditure plans and expansion efforts, particularly in Arizona, signal a positive outlook for future performance. Analysts are optimistic, with some raising price targets as the stock approaches new all-time highs.
